description.ko: 플로라-9은 유기적 식물학과 합성 지능 사이의 경계를 탐구합니다. 이 디지털 종은 데이터 스트림을 먹고 자라며, 가상 생태계 속에서 빛과 코드를 통해 물리적인 아름다움을 구현합니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 explores the boundary between organic botany and synthetic intelligence. This digital species thrives on data streams, manifesting physical beauty through light and code in a virtual ecosystem.

prompt: A hyper-realistic macro shot of FLORA-9, a biomechanical flower existing in a digital vacuum. The petals are made of semi-transparent crystalline layers with glowing turquoise circuit patterns embedded within. Fiber-optic cables serve as the stamen, emitting soft pulses of light. Surroundings feature floating data fragments, holographic pollen, and a soft bokeh of neon binary code. High-contrast lighting, 8k resolution, synthwave color palette, cinematic rendering.
